sections.heading: NO MASKS ALLOWED
sections.content: We are peaceful and lawful, we have nothing to hide.

sections.heading: BRING YOUR VOICE, NOT YOUR VIOLENCE
sections.content: Violence and abuse of the system is what we're here to end. Be better than them.

sections.heading: STAND UP FOR OUR OWN
sections.content: While migrants are housed in these once lovely hotels, our own are left to pay the ever increasing bill.
